snippet: The Buckeyes’ D’Angelo Russell has been one of the most electrifying players in college basketball, Ohio State’s go-to option late in games since the start of the season.
abstract: Profile of Ohio State freshman guard D'Angelo Russell, who ranks in top 25 nationally in scoring at 19.4 points per game; Russell is busy preparing with team for upcoming game against Rutgers.
lead_paragraph: The Buckeyes’ D’Angelo Russell has been one of the most electrifying players in college basketball, Ohio State’s go-to option late in games since the start of the season.

headline.main: Ohio State Freshman Has Fun, and Seizes the National Stage
headline.print_headline: Ohio State Freshman Has Fun, and Seizes the National Stage

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
